channel.title: PodX Test Feed
channel.description: This is a test feed using audio where Katharine Murphy and Guardian Australia's political team examine what’s happening in Australian politics and why it matters to you. There is additional data to show information about Mark Zuckerburg's dog while the episode plays back.
channel.itunes:author: The Guardian
channel.itunes:summary: This is a test feed using audio where Katharine Murphy and Guardian Australia's political team examine what’s happening in Australian politics and why it matters to you. There is additional data to show information about Mark Zuckerburg's dog while the episode plays back.

item.title: A whole lot of images
item.description: The official campaign post-mortem has been completed by Jay Weatherill and Craig Emerson, but with a whole lot of pictures of a dog? Katharine Murphy sits down with Weatherill to discuss the findings of the ‘warts-and-all’ review. Was Bill Shorten found untrustworthy by voters? Will the party continue to be overshadowed by the Rudd-Gillard-Rudd years? How will they combat disinformation in the future?
item.itunes:author: The Guardian
item.itunes:keywords: Jay Weatherill, Australian politics, Australia news, Bill Shorten, Scott Morrison, Malcolm Turnbull, Labor party, Liberal party

Will the party continue to be overshadowed by the Rudd-Gillard-Rudd years? How will they combat disinformation in the future?
